text: Is there a way to turn off Warning messages during sampling?

elements.text: Is there a way to turn off Warning messages during sampling?

text:
```using Logging
# global
Logging.min_enabled_level(Logging.Error)

# local
with_logger(ConsoleLogger(stderr, Logging.Error)) do
    chains = sample(...)
end```
<https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/stdlib/Logging/#Logging.min_enabled_level|logging docs>

you could using LoggingExtras.jl and add a filter if you only want to remove the warnings from a certain module

elements.text:
using Logging
# global
Logging.min_enabled_level(Logging.Error)

# local
with_logger(ConsoleLogger(stderr, Logging.Error)) do
    chains = sample(...)
end
you could using LoggingExtras.jl and add a filter if you only want to remove the warnings from a certain module
